format: C header file (likely C, possibly C++)
description: This file declares functions related to broadcasting communication events within a system, such as online status changes, activation states, media uploads, and system events, intended for use by other components that listen for these broadcasts.
external_methods: void broadcastCloudAssociationEvent(int32_t eventValue, bool critical, bool wasCell, cloudAssociationState cloudAssState, uint64_t lastActiveMillis)
void broadcastMediaUploadedEvent(mediaUploadEventType eventType, uint64_t ruleId, uint64_t requestId, uint64_t uploadId)

methods.name: stopCommEventProducer
methods.description: Shuts down the communication event producer

methods.name: broadcastCommOnlineChangedEvent
methods.description: Broadcasts an event indicating the communication system is online

methods.name: broadcastCloudAssociationEvent
methods.description: Broadcasts an event related to cloud association state change

methods.name: broadcastMediaUploadedEvent
methods.description: Broadcasts an event when media is uploaded
